Write Carlos an email at Carlos3345@gmail.com with the title "Thank you for the Gift" saying that the brother appreciated all the items you sent, especially the sports equipment for inspiration.

Open App: Gmail
Click on button with the text "Compose"
Type text: Carlos3345@gmail.com
Click on button with the text "Carlos3345@gmail.com"
Click on button with the text "Subject"
Type text: Thank you for the Gift
Click on point (309,935)
Type text: The brother appreciated all the items you sent, especially the sports equipment for inspiration
Click on button with the text "Send"
Check status: successful
